line.en: 'Whew... I feel really refreshed now.'
As I come back from my bath, Amane is still in\nthe dining hall staring at the designs.
I take some barley tea from the fridge and sit in\nfront of the electric fan to cool myself off.
I feels like it's a little difficult to speak to\nher right now, so I just vacantly watch her from\nthe side, while the cool air blows over me.
'(She really is pretty, isn't she...?)'
When is deep in concentration, she looks\ndignified and cool.
She's completely in her own world, and there's a\ndistinctive air about her that keeps others from\napproaching her.
If I had to say, she gives the impression that\nshe's absentminded but warm and friendly.
That's why when I see her thinking so seriously\nlike this from time to time, I feel like my heart\nskips a beat.
With these two sides to her, Amane Mochizuki is a\nreal mystery, and I find her fascinating.
'(It wouldn't seem strange at all for her to\nappear in a fashion magazine...)'
She's pretty, has a good figure, and is tall and\nslender.
Even so, she seems completely unaware of this,\nand sometimes it's like she forgets that she's a\ngirl altogether.
I feel like it's kind of a shame, but that's just\nwho she is.

While thinking about this and watching her from
the side, still staring at the designs, Amane
starts muttering as if she's just remembered
something.
'Does Aoi like me, I wonder?'
'Huh?'
Because the way she said it was so casual, for a\nmoment I really didn't understand what she had\nsaid.
As I struggle to find an answer, Amane looks over\nat me.
'Hmm...? What did you say?'
'Does Aoi like me, I wonder?'
'Wh...what's this all of a sudden!? No, it's...\nthe fact that I was looking at you... that's not\nwhat it means at all!'
I was only just that moment thinking to myself\nhow pretty she is, so maybe that's a pretty poor\nexcuse.
'Oh, I guess not...'
